data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of Stenus tenuimargo group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Steninae) with descriptions of two new species from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lv, Wei-Xiang, Zhao, Cai-Yun, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2018): Taxonomy of Stenus tenuimargo group (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Steninae) with descriptions of two new species from China. Zootaxa 4394 (4): 490-516, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4394.4.2
